page.title: 16Recreation
page.content:
One day I went to the Gadds and brushed John Boy down. Dad told me to put the saddle and bridle on. I went off riding with Mrs. Gadd. I went up Mr. White's rides. One goes to Cannon's Green and the other goes out to the road near Mr. White's house. Mr. White does not mind us going along these. We went round to the river and after that we went down to the little river which goes back to Birds Green. This is where Daddy has his lunch when he is working on thefarm. We went home and at the back of our house there is rape in the field. John Boy, my pony, smells the rape.
Other recreations enjoyed by the children in the school are fishing, swimming, television, church choir, Cubs, Brownies, Beavers, Guides.
